languages.text: "Как и я. Но я прошу о снисхождении для моего брата. Его история... инициирует размышления".
"As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."
languages.original_text: "Как и я. Но я прошу о снисхождении для моего брата. Его история... инициирует размышления".

traits.locale_text: "As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."
"As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."
"As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."
"As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."
"As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."

languages.text: 「そうしよう。だが私は私の兄弟に慈悲をと懇願した。彼の話は…思考を初期化した」
languages.original_text: "As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."

traits.locale_text: 「そうしよう。だが私は私の兄弟に慈悲をと懇願した。彼の話は…思考を初期化した」

languages.text: “我也一样。不过，我恳求你对我的兄弟宽大处理，他的故事……启发了我的思想。”
languages.original_text: "As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."

traits.locale_text: “我也一样。不过，我恳求你对我的兄弟宽大处理，他的故事……启发了我的思想。”

languages.text: "Wie auch ich. Und doch bete ich, dass meinem Bruder Gnade gewährt wird. Seine Geschichte ... initialisiert Gedanken."
languages.original_text: "As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."

traits.locale_text: "Wie auch ich. Und doch bete ich, dass meinem Bruder Gnade gewährt wird. Seine Geschichte ... initialisiert Gedanken."

languages.text: « Moi de même. Je vous prie cependant de faire preuve d'une certaine indulgence envers mon frère. Son histoire... ouvre des pistes de réflexion. »
languages.original_text: "As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."

traits.locale_text: « Moi de même. Je vous prie cependant de faire preuve d'une certaine indulgence envers mon frère. Son histoire... ouvre des pistes de réflexion. »

languages.text: «Yo también. Pese a todo, le ruego que muestre indulgencia con mi hermano. Su relato... estimula mis procesos cognitivos».
languages.original_text: "As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también. Pese a todo, le ruego que muestre indulgencia con mi hermano. Su relato... estimula mis procesos cognitivos».

languages.text: "Keza ben de öyle... Yine de kardeşime müsamaha gösterilmesini istirham ediyorum. Hikâyesi... Düşünmeye teşvik ediyor."
languages.original_text: "As will I. And yet I plead that my brother be shown leniency. His story... initialises thought."

traits.locale_text: "Keza ben de öyle... Yine de kardeşime müsamaha gösterilmesini istirham ediyorum. Hikâyesi... Düşünmeye teşvik ediyor."
